data.title: Brooks School: Coeducational Private School in North Andover, MA
data.meta_description: Brooks School: All-gender private school in North Andover, MA. Explore resources, enrollment, and educational opportunities.
data.text:
An exhibition of ceramics by Christopher Isles '77 is on display now through October 1 in the gallery. All are welcome to come view the works. Reserve a time on our Visiting the Lehman page. The artist's reception will be held on September 13. All welcome!

Please join us tonight at our artists's reception for Christopher Isles '77 in the gallery. His "Passion for Pottery" exhibit is on display in the Lehman from September 1 through October 1. Get details on our Robert Lehman Art Center page. All welcome!

Meet and speak with faculty on campus during our annual Fall Visit Day for prospective students and their families.

During this informal event for eighth-, ninth- and tenth-grade students, parents and students will hear from Brooks School's Acting Head of School Nina Freeman and can connect with teachers. Members of our six academic departments - as well as the leaders of our special programs, including Exchange, Students on the Forefront and other initiatives - will be on hand to answer questions. Register and get more details!

Parents, guardians and special friends of current Brooks students, you're invited to Family Weekend, held this year on October 4 and 5. The weekend offers activities, events and an opportunity to meet with teachers and advisors. We look forward to seeing you!

An exhibition of current students' artwork will be on display in the gallery from October 4 through November 23. Please join us tonight for a reception for the artists! You're invited to view the exhibit any time in the future, too, and may schedule a visit online.

Parents, guardians and special friends of current Brooks students, you're invited to Family Weekend, held this year on October 4 and 5. The weekend offers activities, events and an opportunity to meet with teachers and advisors. We look forward to seeing you!

Alumni and their families are invited back to campus for our annual Alumni Homecoming! All are welcome to cheer on our teams playing at home against Middlesex School. There will be a hospitality tent by the turf field with refreshments and raffle items for spectators. We look forward to seeing you!
